org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov

Class ProvUsageResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.ProvUsageResource

  • @Service
 @Path(value="/service/prov")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class ProvUsageResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Usage part of provisioning.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        @GET
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/usage")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.json.TableItem<ProvUsage> findAll(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                                                      int subscription,
                                                                                                                                                      @Context
                                                                                                                                                      javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Return the usages available for a subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the usages from the associated provider.
        uriInfo - filter data.
        Returns:
        The available usages for the given subscription.

      • create

        @POST
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/usage")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public int create(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                       int subscription,
                                                                                                       UsageEditionVo vo)
        Create the usage inside a quote. No cost are updated during this operation since this new ProvUsage is not yet used.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the usages from the associated provider.
        vo - The quote usage.
        Returns:
        The created usage identifier.

      • update

        @PUT
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/usage/{name}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public UpdatedCost update(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                     int subscription,
                                                                                                                     @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                     UsageEditionVo vo)
        Update the usage inside a quote. The computed cost are recursively updated from the related instances to the quote total cost.
        The cost of all instances related to this usage will be updated to get the new price.
        An instance related to this usage is either an instance explicitly linked to this usage, either an instance linked to a quote having this usage as default.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the usages from the associated provider.
        name - The quote usage's name to update.
        vo - The new quote usage data.
        Returns:
        The updated cost. Only relevant when at least one resource was associated to this usage.

      • delete

        @DELETE
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/usage/{name}")
public UpdatedCost delete(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                        int subscription,
                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String name)
        Delete an usage. When the usage is associated to a quote or a resource, it is replaced by a null reference.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the usages from the associated provider.
        name - The ProvUsage name.
        Returns:
        The updated cost. Only relevant when at least one resource was associated to this usage.
